title: Best of the Program | Guests: Herschel Walker & Michael Malice | 8/12/22
description:
Senate candidate Herschel Walker joins to discuss how crucial a red wave is for the upcoming midterms in the wake of the FBI Trump raid. Glenn and Stu discuss the latest details regarding the FBI's raid on former President Donald Trump, as the FBI finally came out with its reasoning for it. Author Michael Malice joins to give his anarchist's take on the FBI's raid on Trump's home. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
